Posts.Content: Sep 19, 2018 08:04PM Annie60 wrote: Day 2 after the surgery and I am sore and woozy. I hate the surgery bra and have another day in it. This has been a year. I developed asthma which I haven't had since I was six, got gout in my hands and now breast cancer. Been retired 4 months and now bc. Palimom- I hate that you are having such a hard time. My doctor told me to take the pain meds even if I felt I didn't need it to stay ahead of the pain. Let us know when you make it home.
